about_the_game:
Champions of Regnum, is a free to play MMORPG focused in epic Realm versus Realm (RvR) and
Player versus Player (PvP) battles.


Choose your Realm and engage in the most dynamic player driven battlefield available on any MMO. Fight for the Alsius Empire, protect the woods of Syrtis or avenge the Brotherhood of Ignis.


Champions of Regnum is a deep and engaging old school RvR MMO developed by an independent studio.
It’s not a grindfest, it’s all about large scale player vs. player gameplay, it’s FREE! and runs on Windows, Linux and Mac natively.

Join the Battle Now!
detailed_description:
Champions of Regnum, is a free to play MMORPG focused in epic Realm versus Realm (RvR) and

Choose your Realm and engage in the most dynamic player driven battlefield available on any MMO. Fight for the Alsius Empire, protect the woods of Syrtis or avenge the Brotherhood of Ignis.


Champions of Regnum is a deep and engaging old school RvR MMO developed by an independent studio.
It’s not a grindfest, it’s all about large scale player vs. player gameplay, it’s FREE! and runs on Windows, Linux and Mac natively.

Join the Battle Now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or AMD Phenom II X3
  • Memory: 2048 MB
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2 and 1 GB RAM: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • Hard Drive Free Space: 7 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4096MB
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4 and 1024 MB RAM: NVIDIA GT240 or AMD R7 260X
  • Hard Drive Free Space: 7 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2 and 1 GB RAM: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • Hard Drive Free Space: 7 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4 and 1024 MB RAM: NVIDIA GT240 or AMD R7 260X
  • Hard Drive Space: 7 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: Champions of Regnum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or AMD Phenom II X3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2 and 1 GB RAM: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 or ATI Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive Free Space: 7 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4 and 2048 MB RAM: NVIDIA GTX 750 or AMD R7 260X
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive Free Space: 7 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Choose your Realm and engage in the most dynamic player driven battlefield available on any MMO. Fight for the Alsius Empire, protect the woods of Syrtis or avenge the Brotherhood of Ignis.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
